name: Reign of Zanderal
description:
An ancient evil awakens - Zanderal. You are now tasked with defeating that evil before his corruption spreads throughout the world. Take control of Addam, Layla, Clairis, and others as you build your party for the challenges ahead. Will you overcome Zanderal and uncover the truth in this Turn Based RPG or will you succumb to his influence? 

Characters can change classes and change equipment.

Enhance your characters by completing various quests and unlocking abilites and skills!

Freely change your party alignment and adjust your strategy on the fly!

Numerous in-game achievements for those that want a challenge.

Hundreds of Weapons and Armors for those collectors.

Hundreds of enemies and monsters to fight and compile in the beastiary. Can you defeat them all?

Discover hidden dungeons and enclaves with special loot!
